text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Nihsandeha musarikara hacche apabitra, kaje'i tadera e'i batsarera pare tara pabitra masajidera sannikate asate parabe na; ara yadi tomara daridrera asanka karo ta hale allah acire'i tomadera samrd'dha karabena tamra karunabhandara theke yadi tini cana. Nihsandeha allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.
